m_szDocTitle: Local Motors to Launch World’s First 3D-Printed Car Next Year | Inside 3D Printing
m_szDocSumamry: Local Motors to Launch World’s First 3D-Printed Car Next Year Published by Sandra Helsel , July 10, 2015 11:20 am (NBC News) — Startup Local Motors plans to launch what it promises will be the world’s first 3D-printed car next year.  The company plans to build two versions of the ReLoad Redacted 3D-printed vehicle using a design that was submitted as part of a contest by Kevin Lo, an engineer living in Vancouver, Wash. Set to debut during the first quarter of 2016, it will be a low-speed battery car, or so-called neighborhood electric vehicle, priced between $18,000 and $30,000. A full speed v
